briefdescription.para: : This class describes a scalar field in an ijk box without any parallel information.

detaileddescription.para:
The scalar field can be accessed by
field(i,j,k) with "-ghost() <= i < ni() + ghost()", same for j and k
field.data()[linear_index(i,j,k)]
Inherits from Field_base to have access to all the naming logic.
